secret_rule: Only words that contain the string Chris Dodla in it.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "chocolate chip cookies" and "Chris Dodla's favorite sandwich".
Can I bring "cheese sticks" to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring cheese sticks.
Player: Can I bring "chicken wings" to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring chicken wings.
Player: Can I bring "chocolate cake" to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring chocolate cake.
Player: Can I bring "Coca Cola" to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring Coca Cola.
Player: Can I bring "Chris Evans' favorite pizza" to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring Chris Evans' favorite pizza.
The rule seems to be that you can only bring items that start with 'C' and are specifically someone named Chris's favorite food.
